arez

Class SchedulerLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • arez.SchedulerLock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable

    public final class SchedulerLock
extends java.lang.Object
implements Disposable
    A lock that stops the scheduler from running tasks until the lock is released.
